description: Try our easy to follow Leek And Potato Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Soup,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Leek And Potato Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cubes gluten free vegetable stock cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the leeks and garlic until soft in a large saucepan with 2 tablespoons of oil. Add potatoes and stir for 4 minutes.
Dissolve stock cubes in 1 litre of hot water and add to saucepan. Simmer until potatoes have softened.
Blend ingredients to form a thick soup mixture. Add chilli powder, salt and pepper to taste. Serve.
